fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the value of the checkbox should change.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.mouseCursor} The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: The color to use when this checkbox is checked.

fields.name: fillColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.fillColor} The color that fills the checkbox, in all [WidgetState]s.

fields.name: checkColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.checkColor} The color to use for the check icon when this checkbox is checked. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: tristate
fields.desc: If true the checkbox's [value] can be true, false, or null.

fields.name: materialTapTargetSize
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.materialTapTargetSize} Configures the minimum size of the tap target. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: visualDensity
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.visualDensity} Defines how compact the checkbox's layout will be. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color for the checkbox's [Material] when it has the input focus.

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.hoverColor} The color for the checkbox's [Material] when a pointer is hovering over it.

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.overlayColor} The color for the checkbox's [Material].

fields.name: splashRadius
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.splashRadius} The splash radius of the circular [Material] ink response. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.shape} The shape of the checkbox's [Material]. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: side
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.side} The color and width of the checkbox's border.

fields.name: isError
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.isError} True if this checkbox wants to show an error state.

fields.name: semanticLabel
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.checkbox.semanticLabel} The semantic label for the checkbox that will be announced by screen readers.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of Checkbox
desc: 【activeColor】: Color inside the box when selected 【Color】
